thread.title: Ramesh Pisharody's dream comes true
thread.title_full: Ramesh Pisharody's dream comes true - The Times of India

author: Asha Prakash
title: Ramesh Pisharody's dream comes true
text:
TV anchor and comedian Ramesh Pisharody reccently revealed in a TV show that an old dream of his came true.
Ramesh was interviewing comedian Nadirsha in the show he co-hosts with Mukesh - Badhai Bungalow. "In my initial days, I had two wishes - to be a part of the show cinemala, and also Nadirsha's parody cassette series De Maveli Kombathu. Now, I am interviewing the same Nadirsha, in a show produced by Diana who produced Cinemala," he said.
Interestingly, Ramesh Pisharody has a role in Nadirsha's upcoming directorial - Amar Akbar Anthony.
